text: @realDonaldTrump @robertjeffress @VP Phony two face Pence is kissing up to Don the Con again today and Gov Ron DeSantis and Gov Greg Abbott are sweating it out now that their states are surging in coronavirus. What losers and so phony. Now they say 'social distance' sure but too late just like Trumphy.
